# Features enabled
Ton="

-i custom-video-buffer
-i remove-screenshot-restriction

"

# Features are turned off
Tof="

-e custom-branding

"

# check vison
Vik="
disable-player-popup-panels
disable-fullscreen-panels

custom-video-buffer
hdr-auto-brightness

hide-album-cards
"

[ "$TYPE" == "true" ] || Mro="
-e vanced-microg-support
"
